g.text: Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the one he wants update a scooter.
Selects the Pharmacy he wants update a scooter.
Shows to the Administrator a list of scooters and asks him to choose the one he wants update.
Selects the scooter he wants update.
Asks for the necessary scooter's data (i.e. capacity (KG), power (W), max battery (W/H)).
Displays the data, requesting confirmation to update the scooter.
Informs about the success of the operation
